verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount סִינַ֖י <WH5514> Sinai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> unto them When ye come אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> which I give לָכֶ֑ם וְשָׁבְתָ֣ה <WH7673> keep הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> you then shall the land שַׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> a sabbath לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

שֵׁ֤שׁ <WH8337> Six שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years תִּזְרַ֣ע <WH2232> thou shalt sow שָׂדֶ֔ךָ <WH7704> thy field וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years תִּזְמֹ֣ר <WH2168> thou shalt prune כַּרְמֶ֑ךָ <WH3754> thy vineyard וְאָסַפְתָּ֖ <WH622> and gather אֶת־ <WH853> תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <WH8393> in the fruit

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗ת <WH7637> But in the seventh שַׁבַּ֤ת <WH7676> shall be a sabbath שַׁבָּתוֹן֙ <WH7677> of rest יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> unto the land שַׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> a sabbath לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> for the LORD שָֽׂדְךָ֙ <WH7704> thy field לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִזְרָ֔ע <WH2232> thou shalt neither sow וְכַרְמְךָ֖ <WH3754> thy vineyard לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִזְמֹֽר׃ <WH2168> nor prune

אֵ֣ת <WH853> סְפִ֤יחַ <WH5599> That which groweth of its own accord קְצִֽירְךָ֙ <WH7105> of thy harvest לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִקְצ֔וֹר <WH7114> thou shalt not reap וְאֶת־ <WH853> עִנְּבֵ֥י <WH6025> the grapes נְזִירֶ֖ךָ <WH5139> of thy vine undressed לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִבְצֹ֑ר <WH1219> neither gather שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> [for] it is a year שַׁבָּת֖וֹן <WH7677> of rest יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall have לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> unto the land

וְ֠הָיְתָה <WH1961> shall have שַׁבַּ֨ת <WH7676> And the sabbath הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> of the land לָכֶם֙ לְאָכְלָ֔ה <WH402> shall be meat לְךָ֖ וּלְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> for you for thee and for thy servant וְלַאֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH519> and for thy maid וְלִשְׂכִֽירְךָ֙ <WH7916> and for thy hired servant וּלְתוֹשָׁ֣בְךָ֔ <WH8453> and for thy stranger הַגָּרִ֖ים <WH1481> that sojourneth עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> Even

וְלִ֨בְהֶמְתְּךָ֔ <WH929> And for thy cattle וְלַֽחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> and for the beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that בְּאַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> that [are] in thy land תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall have כָל־ <WH3605> all תְּבוּאָתָ֖הּ <WH8393> shall all the increase לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <WH398> thereof be meat ס

וְסָפַרְתָּ֣ <WH5608> And thou shalt number לְךָ֗ שֶׁ֚בַע <WH7651> seven שַׁבְּתֹ֣ת <WH7676> sabbaths שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> of years שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> unto thee seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> you have לְךָ֗ יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> and the space שֶׁ֚בַע <WH7651> of the seven שַׁבְּתֹ֣ת <WH7676> sabbaths הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> of years תֵּ֥שַׁע <WH8672> and nine וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> shall be unto thee forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְהַֽעֲבַרְתָּ֞ <WH5674> to sound שׁוֹפַ֤ר <WH7782> Then shalt thou cause the trumpet תְּרוּעָה֙ <WH8643> of the jubile בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִעִ֔י <WH7637> [day] of the seventh בֶּעָשׂ֖וֹר <WH6218> on the tenth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> month בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day הַכִּפֻּרִ֔ים <WH3725> of atonement תַּעֲבִ֥ירוּ <WH5674> sound שׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> shall ye make the trumpet בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> throughout all your land

וְקִדַּשְׁתֶּ֗ם <WH6942> And ye shall hallow אֵ֣ת <WH853> שְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> year הַחֲמִשִּׁים֙ <WH2572> the fiftieth שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year וּקְרָאתֶ֥ם <WH7121> and proclaim דְּר֛וֹר <WH1865> liberty בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> throughout [all] the land לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> unto all the inhabitants יוֹבֵ֥ל <WH3104> thereof it shall be a jubile הִוא֙ <WH1931> he תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֔ם וְשַׁבְתֶּ֗ם <WH7725> unto you and ye shall return אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֲחֻזָּת֔וֹ <WH272> unto his possession וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶל־ <WH413> to his מִשְׁפַּחְתּ֖וֹ <WH4940> unto his family תָּשֻֽׁבוּ׃ <WH7725> and ye shall return

יוֹבֵ֣ל <WH3104> A jubile הִ֗וא <WH1931> he שְׁנַ֛ת <WH8141> year הַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> the fiftieth שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֑ם לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִזְרָ֔עוּ <WH2232> be unto you ye shall not sow וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תִקְצְרוּ֙ <WH7114> neither reap אֶת־ <WH854> for סְפִיחֶ֔יהָ <WH5599> that which groweth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִבְצְר֖וּ <WH1219> of itself in it nor gather אֶת־ <WH853> נְזִרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5139> [the grapes] in it of thy vine undressed

כִּ֚י <WH3588> is a יוֹבֵ֣ל <WH3104> For it [is] the jubile הִ֔וא <WH1931> it קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> it shall be holy תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֑ם מִן־ <WH4480> out הַ֨שָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> thereof out of the field תֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> unto you ye shall eat אֶת־ <WH853> תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <WH8393> the increase

בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> In the year הַיּוֹבֵ֖ל <WH3104> of this jubile הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> of you תָּשֻׁ֕בוּ <WH7725> ye shall return אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> unto his possession

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If תִמְכְּר֤וּ <WH4376> And if thou sell מִמְכָּר֙ <WH4465> ought לַעֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <WH5997> unto thy neighbour א֥וֹ <WH176> or קָנֹ֖ה <WH7069> or buyest מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand עֲמִיתֶ֑ךָ <WH5997> [ought] of thy neighbour's אַל־ <WH408> shall not תּוֹנ֖וּ <WH3238> ye shall not oppress אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> one אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> another

בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> According to the number שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> of years אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after הַיּוֹבֵ֔ל <WH3104> the jubile תִּקְנֶ֖ה <WH7069> thou shalt buy מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> עֲמִיתֶ֑ךָ <WH5997> of thy neighbour בְּמִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> [and] according unto the number שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8141> of years תְבוּאֹ֖ת <WH8393> of the fruits יִמְכָּר־ <WH4376> he shall sell לָֽךְ׃

לְפִ֣י ׀ <WH6310> According רֹ֣ב <WH7230> to the multitude הַשָּׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> of years תַּרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> thou shalt increase מִקְנָת֔וֹ <WH4736> the price וּלְפִי֙ <WH6310> thereof and according מְעֹ֣ט <WH4591> to the fewness הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> of years תַּמְעִ֖יט <WH4591> thou shalt diminish מִקְנָת֑וֹ <WH4736> the price כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> of it for [according] to the number תְּבוּאֹ֔ת <WH8393> [of the years] of the fruits ה֥וּא <WH1931> he מֹכֵ֖ר <WH4376> doth he sell לָֽךְ׃

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תוֹנוּ֙ <WH3238> Ye shall not therefore oppress אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמִית֔וֹ <WH5997> another וְיָרֵ֖אתָ <WH3372> but thou shalt fear מֵֽאֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֙ <WH6213> Wherefore ye shall do אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתַ֔י <WH2708> my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <WH4941> my judgments תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH3427> them and ye shall dwell עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land לָבֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> in safety

וְנָתְנָ֤ה <WH5414> shall yield הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> And the land פִּרְיָ֔הּ <WH6529> her fruit וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <WH398> and ye shall eat לָשֹׂ֑בַע <WH7648> your fill וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH3427> and dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> therein in safety עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> But

וְכִ֣י <WH3588> if תֹאמְר֔וּ <WH559> And if ye shall say מַה־ <WH4100> What נֹּאכַ֖ל <WH398> What shall we eat בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֑ת <WH7637> the seventh הֵ֚ן <WH2005> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נִזְרָ֔ע <WH2232> sow וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or נֶאֱסֹ֖ף <WH622> nor gather אֶת־ <WH853> תְּבוּאָתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH8393> in our increase

וְצִוִּ֤יתִי <WH6680> Then I will command אֶת־ <WH853> בִּרְכָתִי֙ <WH1293> my blessing לָכֶ֔ם בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year הַשִּׁשִּׁ֑ית <WH8345> upon you in the sixth וְעָשָׂת֙ <WH6213> and it shall bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּבוּאָ֔ה <WH8393> fruit לִשְׁלֹ֖שׁ <WH7969> for three הַשָּׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וּזְרַעְתֶּ֗ם <WH2232> And ye shall sow אֵ֚ת <WH853> הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁמִינִ֔ת <WH8066> the eighth וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <WH398> and eat מִן־ <WH4480> from הַתְּבוּאָ֣ה <WH8393> fruit יָשָׁ֑ן <WH3465> [yet] of old עַ֣ד ׀ <WH5704> until הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַתְּשִׁיעִ֗ת <WH8671> until the ninth עַד־ <WH5704> when בּוֹא֙ <WH935> come in תְּב֣וּאָתָ֔הּ <WH8393> until her fruits תֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> ye shall eat יָשָֽׁן׃ <WH3465> [of] the old

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> The land לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִמָּכֵר֙ <WH4376> shall not be sold לִצְמִתֻ֔ת <WH6783> for ever כִּי־ <WH3588> for לִ֖י הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> for the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גֵרִ֧ים <WH1616> [is] mine for ye [are] strangers וְתוֹשָׁבִ֛ים <WH8453> and sojourners אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against

וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> every אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> And in all the land אֲחֻזַּתְכֶ֑ם <WH272> of your possession גְּאֻלָּ֖ה <WH1353> a redemption תִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> ye shall grant לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> for the land ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יָמ֣וּךְ <WH4134> be waxen poor אָחִ֔יךָ <WH251> If thy brother וּמָכַ֖ר <WH4376> and hath sold מֵאֲחֻזָּת֑וֹ <WH272> away [some] of his possession וּבָ֤א <WH935> come גֹֽאֲלוֹ֙ <WH1350> to redeem הַקָּרֹ֣ב <WH7138> and if any of his kin אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> and וְגָאַ֕ל <WH1350> it then shall he redeem אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִמְכַּ֥ר <WH4465> sold אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> that which his brother

וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> And if the man כִּ֛י <WH3588> case לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> has לּ֖וֹ גֹּאֵ֑ל <WH1350> have none to redeem וְהִשִּׂ֣יגָה <WH5381> recovers יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> it and himself וּמָצָ֖א <WH4672> to find כְּדֵ֥י <WH1767> sufficient גְאֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH1353> redemption

וְחִשַּׁב֙ <WH2803> Then let him count אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> the years מִמְכָּר֔וֹ <WH4465> of the sale וְהֵשִׁיב֙ <WH7725> thereof and restore אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עֹדֵ֔ף <WH5736> the overplus לָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> unto the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to whom מָֽכַר־ <WH4376> to whom he sold ל֑וֹ וְשָׁ֖ב <WH7725> it that he may return לַאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> unto his possession

וְאִ֨ם <WH518> if לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not מָֽצְאָ֜ה <WH4672> found יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> But if he דֵּי֮ <WH1767> be not able הָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> and he shall return לוֹ֒ וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> shall remain מִמְכָּר֗וֹ <WH4465> [it] to him then that which is sold בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> shall remain in the hand הַקֹּנֶ֣ה <WH7069> of him that hath bought אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עַ֖ד <WH5704> until שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> it until the year הַיּוֹבֵ֑ל <WH3104> of jubile וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> it shall go out בַּיֹּבֵ֔ל <WH3104> and in the jubile וְשָׁ֖ב <WH7725> back לַאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> unto his possession
